comments: Best BLS professor to take by far. Class and notes are very straight forward, unfortunately the only grades are 3 exam grades. Loftus is extremely helpful and funny and made an 8AM enjoyable. Always looking to help students with anything
loftus is the best. his exams are challenging but if you study youre fine. comes right from the notes he puts on the board-you dont need to know anything but that. hes extremely helpful. funny guy

By far one of the cooler professors at Miami. Only 3 exams, each 1/3 of your grade. Attendance not mandatory, but missing class is a mistake bc all his exams are literally from the notes. Even he says himself. Really a nice guy and always willing to help.

By far one of the coolest professors I have ever had. actually gets college kids, jokes all the time. class is literally all of his notes. the books helps if something he says is not clear but all his exams come straight from what he says. to do well you do need to study and know the material well. really challenges you, but an awesome guy
